unnormalised: Mhozo ek ixtt atmik karnnank lagun Bhartant bhonvddeacho yevzonn korunk asa, ani tannem mhaka suchovnneo vicharleo. Hanv Bhartantlea khub povitr zageancher vorsam bhitor bhonvla, dekhun mhoji thoddi vichar dakhovnk axetam. Ek khorea bollvont onnbhova khatir, tumi Varanasik bhett divonk xakta, zaka Kashi mhunnuy vollkhotat. Tem sonvsarantlea soglleant pornea jivit aslelea xheram modhlem ek ani taka Bhartachi atmik rajdhani mantat. Ganga nodichea degeveller tumkam choddxeo vostu mellttat - suryodayachea botinchea sawaryo, sanjechea artyo, ani nischit rupan, dagnechea degevello. Tem utkhatt asa, punn visrunchona. Hanv thoddeant thodde 3-4 dis thoim ravonk suchoitolom.
normalised: Mhojea eka ixttachem Indiak atmik karnnank lagun bhonvddi korcheachem asa, ani tannem mhaka suchovnao magleo. Hanv vorsamnim Bharotantlea zaitea povitr zageancher bhonvla, mhunn mhaka dislem hanv thoddea vicharanchi vanttnni korum yeta. Ek khoree chomotkarik onubhav zaunk tumi Varanasik bhet ditole, zaka Kashi mhunnui vollkhotat. Tem sonvsarantlem ekdem purannem jivant aslelem xar ani Bharotachi atmik rajdhani mhunn mantat. Gangechea nhomye lagche ghattancher tumkam chodd karyavahai melltoleo â€“ suryodayachim bottinchem feri, sanjechea artiyo, ani khoinchituch dain ghat. Tem tivra asa, punn visorcho mhunn naslolea bhaxen. Hanv thoinch sumar tin te char dis divpak suchoitolo.

unnormalised: Dusro upay mhonnllear Tirupati, Andhra Pradeshant. Sri Venkateswara Mandir hi sonvsarantlea soglleant chodd bhett divpi dharmik zageam modhli ek ani tankam sumar 50,000-100,000 yatrik *doryek dis* mellttat. Devak pollounk mellchea khatir tumkam odhik korun mhoine adinch book korche poddtat ani ghonto lineent ubhem ravchem poddtta. Punn lok sangtat ki darshan aschoryokarok asa. Mhaka ugddas asa jea vellar hanv thoim '05 vorsa pattlean gel'lom, ten'na amkam sumar 12 ghonta lagle! Zori tum bhonvddeacho yevzonn kortat zalear, TTD vebsaitticher darshanachi vell pollounk ugddas dovrat ani tea pormannem bhonvddeche tarikhe adinch korat.
normalised: Dusri suchovnni Tirupati, Andhra Pradeshant. Sri Venkateswara Mondir sonvsarantlea chodd bhet diunk yetolea dhormik zageancherlem ek, ani tankam sumar ponchash hozaranchem ek lakh yatri disak yetat. Tumkam mhine adim book korchem poddtolem ani deiva dhaktem dekhnem gheunche khatir ghontte-ghontte ubo ravchem poddtolem. Punn lok sangtat darshan gazachem mhunn. Mhaka ugddas asa jea vellar hanv don hozar panchint thoinch gelom, tankam bara ghontte lagle! Tum bhonvddi korcheak asa zalear, T-T-D website-acher darshanachim vella pollounk ugddas dovrunk ani tea pormonnem bhonvddechi tarik tharavnk.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tumkam thodem vegllench zai zalear, Hemkund Sahibacho vichar korat. Tem Himalayant 15,000 futt unchaicher aslelem ek Sikh devosthan asa. Trek utkhatt asa, chodd korun 1-2 dis lagtat, punn drishy aschoryokarok asa ani atmik vatavornn dhyeyank mellpa sarkhem asa. Bhett divpak soglleant boro vell mhonnllear Junhachea te October meren. Unn vastram ani bore trekking shoes visronakat! Toxench, dor vorsa March 15chea sumarak nondnni ugddi zata; adinch book korat, na zalear tumkam nirax zanvchi poddtoli.
normalised: Nimannem, tumkam thoddem vegllem zai zalear, Hemkund Sahibacho vichar korat. Tem Himalayant pondhra hozar foot unchayecher aslelem Sikh mondir. Traking kothinn asa, sadarnnoponnan ek te don dis lagtat, punn drishti gazachim astat, ani atmik vatavornn sparsh korpak zata. Juni te October mohineak bhet diunk gazachim vella. Uznn kapdde ani bore traking-ache zote visronakant! Toxech, nondnni March pandhra tarek lagim suru zatat dor vorsak; adinch nondnni korat, nam tor nirasha yetolem.
